Class EmployeeShift

  • java.lang.Object
    • EmployeeShift

  • public class EmployeeShift
extends java.lang.Object
    the name of the employees first and last name

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EmployeeShift(java.lang.String fname, java.lang.String lname, int hours)
      firstname lastname the maxhrs and the minhours they can get depending on the employee it also depends on what time they are avabile to work and what shifts are already taken by other employees also it will allow managers to see when the employees requested time off from work
